item.title: 3. Syntax analysis (1)
item.description: Context-free grammar CFG : defined with a set of production rules ex) E -> E + E E -> E * E E -> id E -> num Derivation ex) E â‡’ E + E â‡’ id + E â‡’ id + num we will use â‡’* to denote arbitrary number of rewriting steps Terminal Symbol vs Non-Terminal Symbol Terminal Symbol : can’t be rewritten anymore (+, *, id, num) Non-Terminal Symbol : can be rewritten (E)
